name: 3anidm12p1
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
comment: A deduction unionizing a non-unionized collection of virtual hypotheses. ~ 3anidm12 denotes the deduction which would have been named uun112 if it did not pre-exist in set.mm. This second permutation's name is based on this pre-existing name. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 4-Feb-2017.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
